== Main inclusion report for mcpp ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/m/mcpp

2. ''Rationale:'' 
* Small and light C preprocessor implementation; drop-in replacement for gcc's cpp.
* Build dependency of xrdb.

3. ''Security:'' 
* No known security issues. Does not run as root.
* No CVEs.
* No Secunia records.

4. ''QA:'' Works fine out of the box.

5. ''Standards compliance:'' Debhelpered package, appears to meet FHS and policy

6. ''Dependencies:'' None
